feed.title: Example ATOM playlist for the JW Player

entry.title: Big Buck Bunny - MP3 Audio with thumb
entry.summary: Big Buck Bunny is a short animated film by the Blender Institute, part of the Blender Foundation. Like the foundation's previous film Elephants Dream, the film is made using free and open source software.

entry.title: Big Buck Bunny - FLV Video with captions
entry.summary: Big Buck Bunny is a short animated film by the Blender Institute, part of the Blender Foundation. Like the foundation's previous film Elephants Dream, the film is made using free and open source software.
